sentence: Trump has invested significant political capital in Georgia, endorsing a slate of statewide candidates in an effort to oust Governor Brian Kemp and his allies for failing to reverse the presidential results two years ago.
author: Joseph Ax
title: Still angry over 2020, Trump returns to Georgia seeking payback

sentence: Trump has invested significant political capital in Georgia, endorsing a slate of statewide candidates in an effort to oust Governor Brian Kemp and his allies for failing to reverse the presidential results two years ago.
author: Joseph Ax
title: Still angry over 2020, Trump returns to Georgia seeking payback

sentence: At a rally in Commerce, a small city northeast of Atlanta, Trump spent the first 20 minutes of his speech repeating falsehoods about the outcome, calling Governor Brian Kemp, a fellow Republican, a "turncoat" and "coward" for failing to reverse the results.
author: Joseph Ax
title: Nursing Grievances Over 2020, Trump Returns To Georgia Seeking Allies

title: Nursing Grievances Over 2020, Trump Returns To Georgia Seeking Allies
Trump pours money into a midterm race for the first time

sentence: At a rally in Georgia last month, Trump denounced Kemp as a "turncoat" and said "Trump voters will not go out and vote for Brian Kemp," who refused to help Trump in his quest to overturn President Biden's razor-thin victory in Georgia.
author: Grayson Quay
title: Trump spends $500k to unseat Georgia governor who refused to overturn 2020 election

sentence: Incumbent Brian Kemp (R) is facing a primary challenge from former senator David Perdue, who has leaned into the idea that the 2020 election in the state was stolen and that it's Kemp's fault.
title: Another indicator that Republican primaries may not center on 2020

sentence: As I wrote in the most recent issue of National Review, Georgia is the most important test in the May GOP primaries of how much Republican voters care about Trump's grievances over the 2020 election: Incumbent GOP governor Brian Kemp won the nomination in 2018 with Trump's endorsement, and he's governed as a staunch conservative.
author: John McCormack
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp 53 Percent, Perdue 27 Percent
